page.title: 12THE HEATHER LAD INN 334383
page.content: Once a farm as well,it is about 150 years old.It can be seen for miles. The roof is made of slate. It has 8 different chimneys. The walls are brick,rendered & painted white. Inside there are 6 rooms and a kitchen and bathroom. There is a front bar and a bar with a pool table and piano. There is no mains electricity but a generator supplies power.There is no mains water supply .There is a lovely veiw right over to Durham Cathedral. The Heather lad is an old fashioned kind of pub but people say you get a good pint,the beer is from Newcastle Brewery .Some people play dominoes in the bar. The owner is Jennny Moore widow of Jimmy Moore .She has lived at the Inn for 50 years. Its a good place to sit outside in the summer,walkers & cyclists often call.Our Caretaker says it's an EXCEPTIONALLY good pint!
